<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mug](/Feats.aspx?ID=1786) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 135 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You make a quick attack and rob your foe in the process. Make a melee Strike against an adjacent foe. If you hit and deal sneak attack damage, you can also attempt to [Steal](/Actions.aspx?ID=68) from the target, even if the target is in combat.
